in_scope: RG-01: User must be able to navigate to a new 'My Reading Goals' page from their main user dashboard.
RG-02: On the 'My Reading Goals' page, if no goal is set for the current year, the user can input a number (positive integer > 0) as their 'Books to Read This Year' goal.
RG-03: Once a goal is set, the 'My Reading Goals' page must display the goal number and the current progress count.
RG-04: When a user marks a book as 'read', the progress count on the 'My Reading Goals' page must be incremented by one.
RG-05: The progress display on the 'My Reading Goals' page should update automatically or upon page refresh after a book is marked as read.
RG-06: The user must be able to edit/change their saved goal number for the current year.
out_of_scope: Testing on browsers other than Chrome and Firefox

test_approach_summary.methodology: Manual testing based on requirements and exploratory testing

assumptions: The development team will deliver a stable build by the end of 2024-07-29.
The test environment will accurately reflect the production environment.
risks: Unforeseen bugs or defects may require additional testing time.
Integration issues with existing SimpleReads functionality may arise.
